attributes.additional_details:
1. Promoting Awareness-Raising about Women’s Health Issues.

2. Providing Training on Supporting Women’s Rights in Healthcare.
Training healthcare professionals, policymakers, and community leaders about women’s health rights.

3. Improving Accountability and Justice Mechanisms.
Promote responsive accountability and justice mechanisms within healthcare systems.

4. Providing More Funding for Research in Women’s Health.
Research is critical to understanding women’s unique health issues.
attributes.background: Promote awareness-raising about women’s health issues, provide training on supporting women’s rights in health, improve accountability and justice mechanisms, and provide more funding for research in women’s health.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710164
